department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Pumping, cleaning, rinsing, and disposal of tank contents in tanks and bilges on board federal government vessels
description: This service notice is for the procurement of pumping, cleaning, rinsing, and disposal of tank contents in tanks and bilges on board federal government vessels.
full_summary:
[RMSO] Disposal of Oily Waste (Commercial Marine Craft)
=====================================================

### Government Tender Announcement

The following is a tender announcement from **[Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)]** for the disposal of oily waste on commercial marine craft:

### Contract Details

* **Contract Title**: Disposal of Oily Waste (Commercial Marine Craft)
* **Solicitation Number**: [WS4606208541](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19894579?extsite=MTk4OTQ1NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Publication Date**: June 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 26, 2024, 14:00 Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 15, 2024

### Contract Requirements

The contractor will be required to provide pumping, cleaning, rinsing, and disposal of tank contents in tanks and bilges on board federal government vessels.

### Tendering Method

This tender is being issued as a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) through Competitive – Open Bidding.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bidders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Important Information

*  The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.
*   The tender is open to all qualified bidders.
*   The contract is subject to the provisions of the Trade Agreement.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Dave Dunne (SPAC/PSPC)
`dave.dunne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`
